Software

Lensing Wikipedia [Demo]
Interactive summaries of human history articles from Wikipedia [More]
lrhiero
Left to right decoding for statistical machine translation [More]
graphprop-smt
Graph propagation for statistical machine translation using PPDB [More]
glm-parser
Multilingual natural language dependency parsing using Tree-adjoining Grammars (under development)
Kriya
Hierarchical phrase-based (Hiero) decoder [More]
Yarowsky algorithm
Bootstrapping algorithms for semi-supervised learning in NLP [More]
TroFi
Metaphor dataset: literal versus non-literal uses of words [More]
XTAG for NLTK
Python code to read and display the XTAG English (and other) grammars [More]
Competitive Grammar Writing
Port of Jason Eisner and Noah Smith exercise to teach weighted context-free grammars
PsychoPy utilities
Utility programs to help create PsychoPy experiments
